title: section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister housing local government heritage) order 2023

title: section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 2. Ciara Shaughnessy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Ciara Shaughnessy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Housing, Local Government and Heritage, is 
appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage, with effect from 17 December 2022.
text_norm: 2 ciara shaughnessy particular whose address deposited office department housing local government heritage appointed special adviser minister housing local government heritage effect 17 december 2022

title: section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 3. Kevin Dillon, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. Kevin Dillon, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Housing, Local Government and Heritage, is 
appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage, with effect from 17 December 2022. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

21 March, 2023. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Tánaiste. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 24th March, 2023.
